argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user was locked out; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: Optional. The user name of the user to be locked out. If no user name is used then the current user is locked out.

page.discussion: Context.Security.LockOutUser() locks out the specified user, or when no user is specified, the current user is locked out. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
